pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonlinear Network, Clustering, and Variable Selection Based on DCOL // It includes four methods: DCOL-based K-profiles clustering, non-linear network reconstruction, non-linear hierarchical clustering, and variable selection for generalized additive model. References: Tianwei Yu (2018)DOI: 10.1002/sam.11381; Haodong Liu and others (2016)DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0158247; Kai Wang and others (2015)DOI: 10.1155/2015/918954; Tianwei Yu and others (2010)DOI: 10.1109/TCBB.2010.73.
